mdRecord.dcterms:title: Marques de Soveral
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Beerbohm, Max, Sir, 1872 - 1956
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Caption: "Unlike Wilkes, who was only half-an-hour behind the handsomest man in Europe, M. de Soveral is usually a minute or two ahead of him."

"Group" is the Vanity Fair classification. "Category" is taken from Vanity Fair, Ltd.: Vanity Fair Color Lithographs (not Reproductions) Dating From 1869 to 1914, From the Original British, Vanity Fair Magazine, Caricatured by Spy, Ape and Others. Cincinnati, Ohio: Vanity fair, Ltd., [1970].
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The Cecil Lang Collection of Vanity Fair Illustrations
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Chromolithography
Politicians--Great Britain--Caricatures and cartoons
